fusion.home.description: The Fusion Workbench is a tool to view the configuration of camunda workflows using Fusion Config
Above you can see all the tasks that are configured, along with the service that implements the task
Click the task to see information about schemas, transformations and tests
fusion.task.description: A task is a 'external task' in camunda
In that task you configure an 'id'. This is the id of the task in the camunda workflow
fusion.service.description: A service is the implementation of the task
It is typically represented by a kakfa topic
